meanings.definition: Applicable everywhere or in all cases.
meanings.sent1: The idea of kindness is universal, meaning it is important everywhere.
meanings.sent2: The concept of time is universal, as it affects everyone equally.
meanings.sent3: Wearing pajamas to work may not be universal, but it would definitely be cozy!
meanings.sent4: Laughter is a universal language that connects people from all walks of life.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of nature's colors is a universal source of joy for many.

meanings.definition: A characteristic or property that applies to all members of a particular set.
meanings.sent1: Love is considered a universal among all living beings.
meanings.sent2: The law of gravity is a scientific universal that governs the movement of objects.
meanings.sent3: The universal of needing sleep often leads to funny dreams.
meanings.sent4: In the world of music, rhythm is a universal that transcends cultural boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The universal of change reminds us that nothing stays the same forever.
